newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nichirei 97/98 profit seen up 58 pct--paper.
newsitem.headline: Nichirei 97/98 profit seen up 58 pct--paper.

text.p: Parent current profit of processed food maker Nichirei Corp in the year to March 31, 1998, is expected to rise year-on-year 58 percent to about six billion yen, a Japanese business daily said on Friday.
The expected sharp rise is due to improvement in its livestock product and frozen food divisions, the Nihon Keizai Shimbun said.
In March, Nichirei estimated its 1996/97 parent current profit at 3.80 billion yen against its actual 1995/96 parent current profit of 7.05 billion yen.
Nichirei was not immediately available for comment on the newspaper report.
